QuestData.Title: Pins and Needles
QuestData.Description: Hngghh!$B$BNope, can't stand yet. It's all pins and needles.$B$BSmall fries like this are usually no problem for the 7th, but we weren't prepared for their electrical attacks. Before I knew it, I was trapped in some kind of static field. Couldn't move a muscle until you came along.$B$BMy comrades were carried deeper into the cave. Get 'em out before they become whelp chow!
QuestData.LogDescription: Release $1oa 7th Legion Dragoons from static fields.
QuestData.RewardText: <The transponder lights up. An uneasy voice comes over the line.>$B$BHello? Is this working? (By the Light, I hate these things.)$B$BThis is Mishka. Missing 7th Legion soldiers have returned to camp. All accounted for.$B$BUh.. over. Message over.$B$BOver and goodbye.$B$BEnd transm- <The radio cuts out sharply.>
